Detailed Description

The namespace 'log' contains routines for interacting with the message logger.

Typedef Documentation

◆ Priority

bitpit::log::Priority

The priority of a message.

Definition at line 63 of file logger.hpp.

Enumeration Type Documentation

◆ Verbosity

enum bitpit::log::Verbosity

The verbosity of the message logger.

Enumerator
QUIET 

No messages wll be written to the output.

NORMAL 

Only messgaes with priority greater of equal "NORMAL" will be written to the output.

DEBUG 

Only messgaes with priority greater of equal "DEBUG" will be written to the output.

Definition at line 52 of file logger.hpp.
